altTitles.en: Cherry Pink na Kougai Souguu (Cherry Pink Encounter Outside School)
Gikei No Seiyoku wo Ane Ni Kawatte Shizumetemita (I Tried Settling My Brother-In-Law's Libido In My Older Sister's Place)
Kami-sama no Iutoori (Exactly Like the Gods Said)
Otonashi-kun to Gyaruko-san (Mister Quiet and the Miss Outgoing)
Seiya no Caribou♀Fallin' Love (Caribou Fall in Love at X'mas)
Toaru Casino no Bunny Girl (A Certain Casino's Bunny Girl)

description.en:
1. Mister Quiet and the Miss Outgoing / Otonashi-kun to Galko-san (大人し君とギャル子さん); Comic Hotmilk 2012-08
2. Shuugaku Ryokou to Galko-san (修学旅行とギャル子さん); Comic X-EROS #01
3. Exactly Like the Gods Said / Kamisama no Iutoori (神様の言うとおり); Comic Kairaku-ten 2014-02
4. Exactly Like the Gods Said: Sela's Story / Kamisama no Iutoori: Sela's Story (神様の言うとおり ～sela's story～); Comic X-EROS #14, 20
5. Sela no X'mas (セラのX'mas); Comic X-EROS #26
6. Caribou Fall in Love at X'mas / Seiya no Caribou♀Fall in Love (聖夜のカリブー♀フォーリンラブ); Comic Megastore 2012-02
7. I Tried Settling My Brother-In-Law's Libido In My Older Sister's Place / Ani no Seiyoku wo Ane ni Kawatte Shizumetemita (義兄の性欲を姉に代わって鎮めてみた); Comic ExE 17
8. Toshishita Syndrome (年下しんどろ～む); Comic ExE 01
9. Toshishita Syndrome: Hatsujou-hen (年下しんどろ～む ～発情編～); Comic ExE 13
10. Yuri-iro Motion (百合色モーション); Comic X-EROS #03, 04
11. A Certain Casino's Bunny Gir / Toaru Casino no Bunny Girl (とあるカジノのバニーガール); Comic Sigma vol.36
12. Cherry Pink Encounter Outside School / Cherry Pink na Kougai Souguu (チェリーピンクな校外遭遇); Comic Sigma vol.49
13. Dokidoki★Community Life 1 (ドキドキ★コミュニティーライフ1); Comic X-EROS #25
14. Dokidoki★Community Life 2 (ドキドキ★コミュニティーライフ2); Comic X-EROS #33
15. Doki² X'mas Day (ドキ² X'mas Day); Comic X-EROS #37
16. Dokidoki★Community Life 3 (ドキドキ★コミュニティーライフ3); Comic ExE 04
